bookTitle: Queen Margot, or Marguerite de Valois
Plot: Released to coincide with the new Miramac film starring Isabelle Adjani, this is the classic novel unavailable for over 25 years. Massacres, conspiracies, clandestine trysts, secret alliances, daring escapes, sumptuous feasts, and duels of wit propel the action in this delightful story of French royalty during the 16th century. Advertising with movie.
Characters: Marguerite de Valois, Henri IV of France, Charles IX of France, Henri III of France, François duke d'Anjou, Comte La Môle, Henri de Guise, Gaspard de Coligny, Catherine de' Medici
